heading: Buried Halls Dungeon Guide
content: Buried Halls is fast dungeon for groups because you can split farm the first objective. Solo players beware though, there's lots of backtracking and annoying mobs here. is available here, and it's highly valued for classes that rely on basic attacks. Still, the ghosts here are rather annoying, making this dungeon mediocre at best. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
